excerpt: "ELLENDALE, N.D. — Applied Digital Corp. has broken ground on its first 100-megawatt high-performance computing facility that will be located about 1 mile west of Ellendale. The announcement was made Tuesday, Oct. 31, on Applied Digital’s website."
